robot
Class RobotState

java.lang.Object
  robot.RobotState

public class RobotState
extends Object

Contains port constants, static references to all sensors and actuators, and information about the robot's state. Sensors shouldn't be referenced directly; instead, update the Robot's state once every ~50ms (the natural "iteration delay" of the robot). Actuators should only be referenced directly if there is no "Fancy" wrapper class for them; if there is, initialize the "Fancy" actuator using the direct reference.

Author:
Ben
